General.Name: Hongrun Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hongrun Construction Group Co., Ltd. engages in construction business primarily in China. The company engages in construction of rail transit, municipal engineering, highways and bridges, underground space and pipe corridors, water environmental protection, offshore engineering, housing construction, etc. It is also involved in the real estate development, infrastructure project investment and construction, solar energy, and international education businesses. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
